creator: admin
name: test_study
descriptions: Our objective was to investigate whether codeine or one of its metabolites contributes substantially to central nervous effects independent from the cytochrome P450 (CYP) 2D6 â€“mediated O-demethylation to morphine.

The method was applied to determine the plasma concentrations of codeine and its metabolite morphine from a clinical trial study in which 20 healthy male volunteers each received orally a tablet containing 30 mg codeine phosphate.

comments: the regular use of drugs including those of herbal origin was not allowed from 4 weeks before the study up to the end of the study period, with the exception of oral contraceptives, and 2 weeks before each study day, the use of over-the-counter drugs was prohibited.
